html:
8.17.18  11:57 am   I haven't been able to be creative lately. Can you give me some advice? I like making comics. 

     take a moment and play the role of the content manager. decide how many comics you are going to do and when you will release them. then once you are confident in the schedule, transform back into the person who has to make the comics and make the damn comics. you may be impressed with how much fun you will have

8.17.18  11:13 am   my dreams and goals are so abstract that they almost seem impossible to do

     oh that means you get way more points if you actually do them

8.17.18  10:51 am   Do you feel like a potato?

     no

8.17.18  10:46 am   What's the most confusing answer you can give to a question?

     nothing is confusing

8.17.18  9:36 am   are there secret messages in your songs

     yes the message is i am the illuminati president 666 confirmed and i will be running for a 4th term please #vote

8.17.18  9:19 am   why do you not like to think about hummus

      it makes me feel confused and scared

8.17.18  8:41 am   what is the answer

     you

8.17.18  8:12 am   why does steve have a mailbox while you just do everything online in the question section

     let's just say steve's life is a little different than mine

8.17.18  7:37 am   Do you think people think that you remove the capital letters on this page if they are a new visitor here

     that would be hard to believe because there are capital letters immediately visible near the top of the page

8.17.18  7:18 am   have electronic saxaphones been invented?

     yes

      if not, on a scale of one to ten how good would they be?

     0 if they don't exist

8.17.18  6:32 am   is it raining?

     yes

8.17.18  5:08 am   it would be more accurate if every sentence started out with "i think" but that would take too much time. thoughts?

     that's true

8.17.18  4:02 am   Why to write a book?

     in case the internet all the computers fail

8.17.18  3:06 am   im home alone what should i do

     express controversial political views

8.17.18  2:45 am   I hate minibuses

     me too. they are so freakin small

8.17.18  2:24 am   Opinions on YouTube?

     i think it's off to a great start

8.17.18  1:31 am   is it time for pizza?

     pizza is timeless

8.17.18  1:19 am   why do I want to want things but I dont want anything?

     maybe you already have everything

8.17.18  12:34 am   What is your mindset when you answer one of these questions?

     it can be fun to try different settings

8.16.18  11:22 pm   How can I stop being so incompetent 

     at what

8.16.18  11:12 pm   how many windows are in you're house

     79

8.16.18  11:07 pm   hello i am the concept of power dynamics in relationships

     oh hi

8.16.18  10:29 pm   What is your favorite way to eat potatoes?

     smashed

8.16.18  9:41 pm   how do I feel less shitty about the art I draw?

     find some even shittier art

8.16.18  9:40 pm   can you explain 2001: A Space Odyssey for me?

     no

8.16.18  8:45 pm   i know you probably don't care but your music is sort of therapeutic for me, i was just wondering really if you enjoy making it?

     yes

8.16.18  8:28 pm   i will never be able to fulfill my dream and i have literally zero plans for the rest of my life tell me what to do

     have some more dreams, until you get some that are fulfillable, and don't forget to keep checking to see if that first one is fulfillable

8.16.18  7:35 pm   how to stop thinking about why do we exist

     explain it to someone, then after that you won't need to think about it for a little while

8.16.18  7:18 pm   what is the name of the russian/polish ravioli potato dish? 

     smashed potatoes

8.16.18  7:06 pm   Are you ever wearing shoes in your videos?

     no

8.16.18  6:36 pm   Did the aliens exists? I think it has be interesting

     we are all aliens, to each other

8.16.18  6:35 pm   how the hell do you choose which questions you're going to answer???

     i only answer questions with socio-political underpinnings

8.16.18  6:18 pm   who i Simon (hello sexy pants)?

     your friend, neighbor, and your friend's neighbor

8.16.18  6:15 pm   do you believe in ufos

     only before they are identified

8.16.18  5:45 pm   Why do you answer questions?

     it's a good learning experience, especially for me

      Is it to get to know your fans? Or perhaps yourself?

     both

8.16.18  4:31 pm   Does your next song feature a song

     yes

8.16.18  4:10 pm   am i able to buy a white bill wurtz shirt with the umbrella logo on it? (like the one u have on in La de da de da de da de day oh)

     that was actually a mis-print but after that i purposely designed one to look like it, which would be the 'just trying to be reasonable' one. i hope it's still there but i don't run that site

8.16.18  4:08 pm   which bob ross painting should i paint

     one of the ones that starts black, not white

8.16.18  4:08 pm   You make things so simple and effortless yet so rich and meaningful, how ? 

     if i don't i might have to pay a huge fine

8.16.18  4:07 pm   You know how people say the best thing to do is being yourself but by being yourself you're not feeling yourself because people told you to be that so it's not totally you !! So you're back at not knowing yourself nor the people !! 

     try being a little different each day and see which way you like

8.16.18  4:04 pm   What signifigance does the date 8/36/2018 have to you?

     i have to go to a thing right around that time

8.16.18  3:44 pm   How to avoid panic?

     take a walk

8.16.18  3:35 pm   hello bill, are you afraid of death? what would you say to someone who is afraid of death, like me?

     try life

8.16.18  2:40 pm   are you a monkey

     some what

8.16.18  2:27 pm   do you ever ask yourself questions

     oh hell yeah. that's one of my most important techniques

8.16.18  2:05 pm   when is the video you are making going to be done?

     very soon

8.16.18  1:54 pm   you ever listen to a song and it starts off and you think "it would be really really cool if it did this" and then it goes in a totally different direction? i wonder if that means there is an inner songwriter in me that has a specific way it wants to make songs. the thought of that is very exciting, cause that means if i keep going at it then i could make music that sounds really good to meeeeeeeeeee and it might even be unique and i might actually have my own voice in music after allllllllllllllllllllllll

     that's true

8.16.18  1:33 pm   how can i math

     you already are

8.16.18  12:44 pm   hey bill, why do so many of your old songs start with that percussive section, with no melody? like "i can make the seasons change," or like in rabbit snakes. is there a strategy in doing that that helps you make songs?

     yes

     id love to know more about this trick.

     sometimes if you start with total garbage on purpose it can really open up some doors, wider than you may have expected

8.16.18  11:59 am   What does Nike want me to do

     buy their product
